title: WordPress 6.9 “Gene”
content:
WordPress 6.9 is here!

Major upgrades for team collaboration and content creation.

  • Notes feature: Introduces block-level commenting to streamline reviewing and polishing content.
  • Command Palette: Now faster for power users.
  • Abilities API: Provides a standardized way to open the door for AI-powered and automated workflows.

title: Marina Di Candia & WordPress Credits: my experience
Is WordPress Free? Yes and No — Here’s Why
content:
Is WordPress Free? Yes and No — Here’s Why

WordPress itself is free and open source, but getting a site online involves costs like a domain and hosting. The free WordPress software includes access to the website builder, hundreds of free themes and plugins, and the ability to export and reuse site files. However, running a fully functional website always incurs costs, including domain names, web hosting, premium plugins and themes, and development and maintenance costs.
